faqs.q: How many calories is in a peanut butter jelly sandwich?
faqs.a: Approximately 390 kcal for a standard version with 2 slices bread, 2 tbsp PB, and 1 tbsp jelly.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a PB&J sandwich?
faqs.a: About 13 g, mostly from the peanut butter.

faqs.q: Are PB&J sandwiches high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, around 15 g total sugars, mainly from jelly and bread.
